nodes.text: Vempor was a Human male officer of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War.

Stationed on the prison world of Belsavis during the Invasion of Belsavis, he reported that prisoners escaped from their cells and caused a terrible riot and many prison guards' family members were trapped in the intake lot. Since the guards wanted to get their families safety off world, Vempor asked a Republic individual to prevent the prisoners from harming the families. The individual successfully defeated a number of enemy prisoners, allowing the armored vehicle to safely transport the civilians off world.
